name: Colorful Dress
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.3-0.7.

  • Keys: colorful_dress

Very simple to use, just use the keyword, higher weight means higher chance to have rainbow color dresses.

Works great with clothing LoRAs, so as i did in my images use a clothing LoRAs for the dress you want in comb with this one like "(wearing luxury dress, colorful dress:1.3)" and you will have a rainbow luxury dress.

I have made all my images with 1.3 weight on the keyword and 0.5 weight on the model but with higher weight you might get brighter colors but you may risk to generate artifacts.

It also works with anime, example in the posted images.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians
